titleStmt.title: A learned, vsefull and seasonable discovrse concerning the Chvrch of England, and the Chvrch of Rome addressed by way of letter to M. St. Iohn, a Romish priest / by that eminent author and worthy patriot, Dr. John Bastwick, now prisoner under the popish tyranny at Yorke.
titleStmt.author: Bastwick, John, 1593-1654.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
